title: internet connectivity or APIs
extract: “An application programming interface (API) is a set of routines, protocols, and tools for building software applications. ... An API defines functionalities that are independent of their respective implementations, which allows definitions and implementations to vary without compromising each other.Jun 19, 2015
extract_html: “An application programming interface (API) is a set of routines, protocols, and tools for building software applications. ... An API defines functionalities that are independent of their respective implementations, which allows definitions and implementations to vary without compromising each other.Jun 19, 2015
